text:
Morning/Evening

Does anyone know how to change the colour of the “I agree” button  (used in the chatbot):
We're seeing a bunch of Rate limit errors (across customers/access tokens) -- anyone else?
might have stopped? could have just been a blip

It’s been a few years — wondering if there is still any discussion or movement around figuring a good way to allow folks to add class names to sections in the DND editor. I know you can still code them into reusable sections… but that is still pretty rigid. I feel like a lot of people could still really benefit from being able to add them directly to sections in the DND interface.
